body: 我好了哼哼哼啊啊啊啊
这类cp太好吃了吧！！莫多莫多

ok wow, i read up on how this mangaka was losing passion for her work and recently regained it and you can definitely tell. these newer works have a lot more life in them. i can’t wait for the english ver ❗️❗️❗️❗️
the girl is so cute….!!!!!?(;(5;?;4;( akjjbjgvcvg i
太好看了……好辣……超辣……🥵🥵完全是夢寐以求的互動欸拜託作者多畫一點，求求了
@Janus22 but gotta be honest, it's amazing how the artist manage to find the border of not too bishoujo/shounen but not too plumpy like many doujins. Best of both worlds if I must say
LMAO i just went to that other doujin and saw that i ghosted you for the past 4 days
Just waiting for this in English, but nice to see a cute tomboy with a handsome guy and vanilla too. Neat.

Yatomomin looks like an Shoujo Artist/Mangaka. All their stories have pretty guys who have all the design elements and personality of Shoujo, and the art in general looks like one. Even the NTR isn't about the male figure, but the female. It's pretty interesting, considering this is not the choice of most doujin artist.
Nonetheless, awesome art, the plot seems to be interesting, with a lot of pages, lots of scenes and overall very good poses. Expecting more translations.
